enchantment.ffenchantments.bloodlust.des: Gives the wielder strength when a mob is killed.
enchantment.ffenchantments.vampiric.desc: Has a chance to heal the wielder on hit.
enchantment.ffenchantments.weighted_blad: Critical hits have a chance to inflict weakness.
enchantment.ffenchantments.searing.desc: Has a chance to light mobs that hit you on fire.
enchantment.ffenchantments.steadfast.des: Reduces knockback taken and knocks back attackers.
enchantment.ffenchantments.outrush.desc: Deals increased damage to fire mobs.
enchantment.ffenchantments.torrent.desc: Increases entities' swimming speed while the trident is being held.
enchantment.ffenchantments.aquatic_rejuv: Regenerates the durability of tridents while being held in water or rain.
enchantment.ffenchantments.obsidian_skul: Reduces damage taken when flying into walls with an elytra.
enchantment.ffenchantments.buoyancy_hors: Allows horses to float in water while being ridden.
enchantment.ffenchantments.quickness_hor: Increases the movement speed of horses.
enchantment.ffenchantments.maelstrom.des: Pulls in mobs towards the trident and damages them.
enchantment.ffenchantments.inferno.desc: Sets mobs near arrows fired from a crossbow on fire.
enchantment.ffenchantments.anchoring_cur: Causes the wearer to sink faster in water.
